Class Word

java.lang.Object
Word
public class Word extends Object
Deprecated.
Represents a word with attributes to mark it as misspelled, miscapitalized, or a double word. Note: This class was not applied in the final project but is kept here for potential future use or reference.
Since:
2023-10-30
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yi Ran
